title: Journalist convicted of helping Anonymous hack the LA Times
text:
Journalist convicted of helping Anonymous hack the LA Times 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
A journalist accused of helping a rogue hacking group briefly take control of the Los Angeles Times website was convicted by a federal jury ...
